subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Question ..
author: Lisby
full_text:
Debbie--right now, I have to say that I think a lot of us here-- 
Bruce, me, Frank S., Steve H., and lots of others--are all  
communicating with at least some common entities. More people have  
heard the name/number "Seven" than is statistically conceivable. An  
entity called Lisa seems to visit at least three of us. I'm getting  
the name David, which seems to have a connection to others on this  
list. And I hear Frank S.'s people calling "Purple" an astounding  
number of times every time I do a session.

What's happening right now is very interesting. Which is why my ears  
perked up when someone--can't recall who off the top of my head right  
now (sorry)--posted a message containing "Big Circle," which I  
recognize as a group of AA-EVP researchers with which you and I are  
both familiar.

I think this development is both astounding and fascinating and  
thrilling.

I know it doesn't exactly answer your question, but it is food for  
thought.

Debbie--can either post that astounding clip from your site (the one  
with them exclaiming "Who is that?" when they hear you and "That's  
fabulous!" after you answer) or post the URL. To me, that clip is the  
epitome of two-communication.

Ann

On Jan 14, 2008, at 6:51 PM, misujoey wrote:

> speaking and helping?
>
> I've swept "Manually", used the "MiniBox" and the "SuperBox" and there
> seems to be a different set of people on each device.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Debbie
>
>
>
